#summary References to GitTorrent related work and resources.

== Existing Work ==

 * [http://gittorrent.googlecode.com/files/Fonseca-2006.pdf Paper] describing an initial draft of [http://jonas.nitro.dk/gittorrent/rfc.html the RFC v0.1] [http://jonas.nitro.dk/gittorrent/rfc.xml (xml)].
 * [http://gittorrent.utsl.gen.nz/rfc.html Extended RFC] by Sam Vilain [http://utsl.gen.nz/gitweb/?p=gittorrent (gitweb)] [http://utsl.gen.nz/gitweb/?p=gittorrent;a=blob_plain;f=rfc.xml;hb=HEAD (xml)].

 * [http://utsl.gen.nz/gitweb/?p=VCS-Git-Torrent;a=summary Initial steps of Perl library].
 * [http://jonas.nitro.dk/gittorrent/libgtp.git/ Initial steps of a C library].
 * [http://utsl.gen.nz/gitweb/?p=php-gt;a=summary Planning of a PHP library].
 * [http://jonas.nitro.dk/gittorrent/tracker/ Simple tracker implementation] from initial draft project.

== Related Protocols ==

 * BitTorrent
 * DebTorrent

== Git Resources ==

 * [http://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/ Main distribution point] with the [http://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/ man pages] and a [http://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/tutorial.html tutorial].
 * [http://www.git-scm.org/ homepage] with [http://www.git-scm.org/gitwiki wiki].

 * Linus Torvalds' [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4XpnKHJAok8 talk on git].
 * Randal Schwartz' [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8dhZ9BXQgc4 talk on git].

== Statistics Tools ==

 * [http://gittorrent.googlecode.com/files/git-stat-tools.zip Scripts] for analysing git repositories.
 * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/gitstat/ gitstat] webbased statistics and monitoring system originally created for monitoring [http://tree.celinuxforum.org/gitstat/ the Linux kernel].

== Libraries ==

 * Ruby: [http://repo.or.cz/w/gitrb.git gitrb] [http://repo.or.cz/w/git/ruby-binding.git ruby-binding].
 * Java: [http://repo.or.cz/w/egit.git library and Eclipse plugin].
 * Serialization: [http://repo.or.cz/w/git/fastimport.git Fastimport] (has been merged for some time) and [http://repo.or.cz/w/git/packv4.git Packs version 4].
